29.ara-name: كتاب الفرائض عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah narrated that a freed slave of the Prophet (s.a.w) fell from foliage on a date-palm and died. So the Prophet (S.A.W) said:"See if he has any heirs." They said: "No." He said: 'Pay it to someone among the people of the town

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الَّذِي يَمُوتُ وَلَيْسَ لَهُ وَارِثٌ
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About The One Who Dies And Has No Heirs
